website_summaries.verdict: A lower outdoor love seat that makes a good lounger for camping or party environments. One of the most ergonomic love seats.
pros: Uniquely designed with an inclined seat angle to increase overall comfort
Lower to the ground to support individuals with shorter legs
Features adjustable arm rest and insulated beverage holders
cons: Quilted fabric makes the seat slightly more difficult to fold up for storage

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, functional, lifetime quality, and downright sexy.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is 5 stars. One of the best beach purchases I have made. Great for camping, sunsets on the beach, fishing, and Hawaii life in general. Perfect height. Carrying tote makes life a breeze and doubles as a sitting pad for the sand and/or a foraging sling. You can buy much cheaper chairs, and you can pile them in landfills. This is going to be one of those products my future kids steal from home when they go off to college.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Landau

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic chair, fantastic company
customer_reviews.text: After having some problems with delivery services. We received our chair and are very happy with it. The company selling the chair was fantastic to work with. As seen in pic the chair is puppy approved, and my wife also likes it. It is the perfect solution for a overcrowded chair, puppies must be present at all times.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I don't go anywhere without this chair!
customer_reviews.text: My guy and I are obsessed witht his chair! We camp and adventure a lot. For cold nights it's great to be snuggled up, and even when it's not cold, it's still nice. I love the carrying case it comes in. The cup holders are double wide. I'm 5'8" and he's 6'4" and we're both built pretty hardy, We fit very comfortably with lots of room to spare. There hasn't been a couple we've camped with that isn't getting on of their own. We have the low version which is very loungy and has been great for everything so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lynn

customer_reviews.title: DNP Breaks Over Time
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT purchase this chair. It will break down over time because of a design flaw. We exchanged our first one because the front 3 support poles broke. They sent a replacement and now we're out of warranty. Well. . . . Opened and closed it a few times and the metal just scrapes away. Waiting to hear back what they're willing to do.
customer_reviews.author: Ali M

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfy “camp chair” I’ve ever sat in. I love that it’s low to the ground, it’s perfect for outdoor concerts where you don’t want to block other people’s view, great for my kids soccer games, and of course great for camping. It even fit perfectly under my beach umbrella/tent which lays on the ground. It was so comfy I even fell asleep on the beach sitting in it. My one complaint is that it still smells smoky after taking it camping, even after allowing it to air out. It’s really mild so I don’t consider it a real problem.
customer_reviews.author: dawnica

customer_reviews.title: It’s comfortable if you don’t have issues sitting a little lower to the ground.
customer_reviews.text: I would love to give this 5 Stars. 3/5 of us found it to be very comfy, 5/7 if you count the dogs. My one and only complaint is that the front leg comes apart sometimes and there where times when we were using it without knowing that the support wasn’t in the right place. For $100 I don’t want to have to worry about if all the framework is where it is suppose to be.
customer_reviews.author: craftymama

customer_reviews.title: Great for short people! Not great for pregnant people!
customer_reviews.text: We had to order this one from Amazon because we accidentally left our other one in my sister's car and she lives 280 miles away so it was cheaper to just buy a brand new one! We Will get the other one when we see her at Thanksgiving! Haha! It will be super helpful to have two of these! Thanks Kelty for having awesome lowrider camp chairs! They work extremely well for us short people! Super comfortable and fun to snuggle on also!
customer_reviews.author: Tamra Fay Moss Lee

customer_reviews.title: two paws up!
customer_reviews.text: Got this chair for my dog and I to share when we go camping...it's perfect! Super comfy and plenty of space for both of us.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The chair's quality is great, but is not comfortable for me. I can't sit for more than 20 minutes, the chair is not good for my lower back. Maybe adding a thick and firm cushion could help me. I did not return it because my dogs love the $99 Kelty low loveseat chair.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair for snuggles with toddlers.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this chair for a weekend event. We used it pretty constantly for several days and it’s still holding up well. It’s big enough that my husband and I can sit in it and have the toddler fit as well. This helped stop some meltdowns and it’s much nicer than lugging around three chairs. It’s much more pricey than some of the other options but the quality is far better as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kellyrenee

customer_reviews.title: No longer need an outdoor couch. This is so much better.
customer_reviews.text: We decided to outfit our deck with this instead of basket-weave chairs or iron outdoor couches. This was the best decision of my life because people can move them as needed. We can take that to the beach. Easily winterize in New England. I might buy another for our upstairs deck. These scream, get comfy at our house and don't worry if your kid spills a drink. Let's have fun and make it look classy.
customer_reviews.author: AustinNewYork

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying from Kelty again! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm super impressed with this chair. Not sure what the weight limit is but I had around 475 pounds on it freqi for a 4 day camp out and it did just fine. Not one issue. Fabric is much thicker than I have seen in other folding chairs. Cupholders are well designed and the bag it comes in is pretty useful for carrying other things around while you camp.
customer_reviews.author: Jensen familyTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: LOVE. THIS
customer_reviews.text: LOVE. THIS. CHAIR. My husband (5'11" and 160lbs) and my brother (6' and 200lbs) both sat in this chair comfortably enough together, that they both ended up napping in between soccer games. And they still had room to move. My hubby and I can also cuddle comfortably in this chair, and still have our 9 yo son sit in the middle of us, comfortably. I use the word comfortable a lot for this because the back of the chair is angled and sits low to the ground, making it easy to just chill and relax.
customer_reviews.author: Jewleepink

customer_reviews.title: This seat is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This seat is awesome! The material is the thickest out of all the seats I've purchased. The backrest is is at a perfect angle to relax and the frame feels solid. I've been using it at my kid's soccer and basketball games/practices. Everyone I know has tried it out and wants one now. I'd highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JE1212Y

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but low and leans back a bit too much.
customer_reviews.text: Love sitting with my favorite people in this “love seat”. I can even lie down in it when I have it to myself. Only complaint is it is a little too low. When I sit in it as designed it leans back too much. Find myself sitting forward with elbows on my knees to get a good view of the baseball games I am watching.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: Love low loveseat
customer_reviews.text: Get cozy with that special someone or pet! Comfy and roomy perfect to relax with something to read or watch. Kelty warranty is also as solid as this product. Another chair strap broke and kelty promptly send a replacememt

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and folds up nice.
customer_reviews.text: My wife love this chair. We have only used it a few times so far. It looks great. My wife and I set close and comfortable, even when our five year old hops aboard. I like the carring bag. Brilliant!!!
customer_reviews.author: Destrie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome couch for two!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this couch! My husband and I go camping and we can snuggle next to each other. Bought it 5 years ago and now I buy for wedding present. We have gotten lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy! Saw a couple at a local amphitheater ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Buy! Saw a couple at a local amphitheater with it and fell in love. It comes with a handy backpack for easy carrying too. Sits nice and low. Perfect for campfires or beach days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's like, living room size
customer_reviews.text: The two of us total just 270lbs, so this was way too big for us. It's like, living room size. It is quite heavy, too. On the other hand, if you are big people, this large, sturdy unit is probably just what you need.
customer_reviews.author: John McGehee

customer_reviews.title: Low chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair is really low sitting and hard to get up out of. Nice quality chair but just very low.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect camping chair!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect camping chair! I bought this chair for my last camping trips and it's great. It's low to the ground and has a slightly reclined back so it's very comfortable for relaxing by the campfire. It also comes with a great carrying case that makes the chair super easy to store and take out. We've also taken it to an outdoor concert since it has a fairly low back it will work for most outdoor shows without blocking people's view. Love this chair!
customer_reviews.author: P-LO

customer_reviews.title: Everyone who sees our chair wants one!
customer_reviews.text: We love this handy chair. We originally purchased it to fit under a low half-tent that we take to soccer games. It fits perfectly under the tent and makes for easy, unobstructed watching, as a regular chair is too tall. The backpack-style carrier with its wrap and strap cover is super handy and makes it easy to pack up and haul around. I appreciate not having to struggle with a flimsy carry bag. Without fail, there is always someone who comments on it, asks about it, and says they are going to buy one after they see ours. We love the quality, the colors, and the convenience of this loveseat chair.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: This chair is AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This loveseat chair is SO COMFORTABLE I can’t stand it. You could literally fall asleep in it. Best outdoor chair I have ever bought. Love love love
customer_reviews.author: Laurie M.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE LOVE LOVE This chair
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE This chair!!! Our friends have one and we couldn't WAIT to get it. We currently have it set up in our bonus room and find that we sit in it a lot. its for our camping trips but why not use it now! Its very comfortable and you feet dont dangle.- easy sit up and packing up!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Boyea

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this in REI and decided that I needed one of these in my life. So I bought one on here, and I love it. We use it for backyard parties, glamping, or when we need extra seating for guests.
customer_reviews.author: Katron

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this chair! Our friend has a Kelty chair and we have been looking for a loveseat camp chair for a while. Bought it to take to youth league baseball games and tournaments. Low profile works great not to block others view. Well made and would buy again! A little pricey but this is a quality chair! Also, love the bag design works great to take off your shoes and use in front of the chair on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Dad-T

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup, Carry & Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair so much! Even if you don’t have a partner, there’s always someone who forgot a chair and it’s great to have another seat! I like to prop my feet up on the other end during soccer games and relax!
customer_reviews.author: Heathercorcoran00

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chair so far sits close to the ground so ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent chair so far sits close to the ground so you can kick your legs out looks and feels like it was well built!! My beagle really likes it because it is effortless to jump into!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A fun choice for picnics!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great choice for young kids, since it sits low to the ground and allows for more than one person to sit at a time. The cupholders are very useful, and I like that it is more padded than other chairs. Love that I don't have to stuff it into an annoying bag -- the case makes it very easy to pack up.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy chair
customer_reviews.text: After going through many low quality chairs I decided for a change. I bought this chair because I am familiar with Kelty and their products. This chair did not disappoint. It is VERY sturdy! Easy to pack. I have gotten many compliments from other people when we go camping :) Not to mention it is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Love this seat
customer_reviews.text: Love this love seat. I hope it bit light but otherwise, I love it just Cary one seat for two person. Low rise that’s more relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Hydra

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy, great height for adults and kids
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy, great height for adults and kids. Wish it had a bit more fire/ember resistant covering as i already have several holes in it after 2 camping trips. It is heavy, so it's not for hiking very far with...it's definitely a car camping or not far to carry event type of chair. I bought the matching reclining chairs as well. Great products.
customer_reviews.author: El_Duder

customer_reviews.title: Low Loveseat Chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is really comfortable. It's a good "snuggle" chair for me and my husband. Its a little hard to get up out of because it sits so low but, we still like it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Simpkins

customer_reviews.title: It's a little pricey, but I would recommend it. It's efficient.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that we only have to pack/load/carry "one" chair instead of two. Our 1 year old son and us have plenty of room to sit and watch family events, soccer games, and enjoy the outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Erai88

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS ONE, TRUST ME!!
customer_reviews.text: Frickin awesome. perfect height, easy to get out of and get size for two or even just for one person that loves sitting sideways and kicking their feet up!
customer_reviews.author: Ice Duchess

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and a great way to sit closer with my ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and a great way to sit closer with my wife while still having a little back support and some cup holders. It does sit pretty low, but that is of course mentioned in the product name.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this loveseat. It folds out and up easily. It's great quality, thick material. I've had it to the beach and lake without it rusting. I get compliments on it frequently. It is low to the ground, so the elderly or anyone with disabilities may struggle getting out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Queen B

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift but seems nice
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like good quality and like it would last but it was bought as a gift. Comes with a nice carrier as well.
customer_reviews.author: Elisha

customer_reviews.title: Soccer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this double chair for our Soccer games. A little low to ground but very comfy. I will be using for camping!
customer_reviews.author: mary remillard

customer_reviews.title: This chair is awesome, and the envy of others wherever we unfold ...
customer_reviews.text: This chair is awesome, and the envy of others wherever we unfold it. Sturdy, comfortable, good degree of recline, and super easy to return to carry case. Pockets are stable and good size. Fits two adults easily, even if those two adults don't really like each other.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, easy to open and close, and stupidly romantic especially for live concerts or sitting by a stream.
customer_reviews.author: MaryG

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me and my aging, overweight cat. I think if you were tall, or had back issues, the height may be a problem though.
customer_reviews.author: PeterG

customer_reviews.title: recommend to spray some water repellent on i
customer_reviews.text: Love the chair. BUT I would highly recommend to spray some water repellent on it as these act as a sponge and soak up water.
customer_reviews.author: Tazzeyy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Highly recommend. Perfect for camping with my border collie/spring spaniel mix dog. Love that it is a bit lower to the ground. Super comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Debra S Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: It’s low for the beach, concerts, camping etc. plus little kiddos can climb it without falling over.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for the parents
customer_reviews.text: I’m very satisfied with the product. Purchased it for my parents to enjoy down on the beach. This item was available for prime shipping through other sellers but Al’s had it priced better even with paying for upgraded shipping. I really appreciate them getting the package out quickly. 5 stars for the product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce_G

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cozy chair!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We are a soccer family. It is such a pain to drag a bunch of chairs. This thing is life changing! On cold days we can snuggle. There is always an extra seat. It folds up perfectly and can be carried on your shoulder. Highly recommend it. We just might buy another one for camping!!
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Bedoya

customer_reviews.title: ... the stars and listen to the surf with my love. Seat was comfortable and just the right size ...
customer_reviews.text: Took the loveseat to the beach last Saturday night to watch the stars and listen to the surf with my love. Seat was comfortable and just the right size for the both of us and I am 6'3"!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Pultorak

customer_reviews.title: Would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my wife and I to cuddle together by a camp fire. This is really made from quality product.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: The height is perfect, its very comfortable and its very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a long camping road trip. The height is perfect, its very comfortable and its very sturdy. It also comes with a great tote type bag to keep it a good size. Both my fiance and I, as well as our 70 lb dog are able to sit on it (he likes to climb up on top of us while we sit in). Its much better than having 2 separate camping chairs in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is really comfortable! I thought that it would be too low but it was just right. I'm 5'3 and some camping chairs are uncomfortable on the back of my thighs when seated. I only bought one and my kids were always trying to get back on this chair first after being off from it. I might buy another one soon!
customer_reviews.author: ana

customer_reviews.title: Strong and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough good things about this amazing camp chair. My wife and I have used it three times recently while camping. It’s strong and it’s comfy. Best of all, my back doesn’t hurt at all... even after more than an hour in it. If you like cozying up to your SO, this chair is hard to beat!
customer_reviews.author: Bradly and Erica

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted one of these, and I'm so glad I bought a Kelty! Very comfortable and well made! Love the grey and blue color scheme. It is lower to the ground which is super comfy on the legs and makes it easy to lounge in front of the campfire at night. Can be a bit more work to get out of sometimes...but it's not bad at all. Has plenty of room for me and the hubby with our grandbaby or pups in between us. Both the pups and grandson love it! Highly recommend this loveseat chair!!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: the most desired camp chair around the fire
customer_reviews.text: takes up less room than two chairs and better for staying warm with your man by the fire.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper Kligier

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great chair, very comfortable, easy to pack and unpack, has a convenient carry sling. Be aware, this is the 'low" version of the Kelty loveseat. It is more comfortable than the high model to sit with legs outstretched, but can be challenging to get back up....Husband and I agreed when we can no longer get up out of it, it's time for The Home...
customer_reviews.author: Brown82

customer_reviews.title: Easy to transport and use
customer_reviews.text: Love that this chair is about the size of a one person chair and easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Doyle Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chair. Everyone always complements this love chair
customer_reviews.text: Perfect chair. Everyone always complements this love chair. It is a tad too low but doesn't make It uncomfortable. Very durable. Not heavy. Really easy to pack in the bag. Nice design.
customer_reviews.author: ChristS

customer_reviews.title: Great chair.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is awesome, perfect for camping, the beach or even to use on my balcony. Would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Evenstar

customer_reviews.title: Cup holder mesh torn. But still a good product.
customer_reviews.text: one of the cup holders the mesh was torn. Other than that product is robust. I'm still keeping the chair.
customer_reviews.author: JPRO1

customer_reviews.title: Well made!!  Perfect for camping.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. My daughter and her husband use it when camping. They absolutely love it. It is very well made. Very convenient -- you have a a separate compartment to put your phone and drink. Sturdy. Good quality. Comfy. Not as light weight as she would like for a long hike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This chair is SO comfortable, and really well made
customer_reviews.text: This chair is SO comfortable, and really well made. I highly recommend and will be buying from this brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dallyce Morris

customer_reviews.title: Well built and comfortable. Folds up easily
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it folds up and it is not much larger than carrying many single chairs. Comfortabl and well built!
customer_reviews.author: Mr  Slice

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous paying this much for a folding chair, but not disappointed at all. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Such a comfortable camping chair
customer_reviews.text: Such a comfortable camping chair. Took it on a 10 day rafting trip in Alaska, and it was the best item we took!
customer_reviews.author: c11111

customer_reviews.title: Not stain resistant
customer_reviews.text: Tucket surfing to the beach. Used it as a bench in the sand, fell straight asleep. Great Buy. I'm 5 foot 11 inches, and I could lay sideways and use the armrest as a pillow almost.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Gift to my parents
customer_reviews.text: Gift to my parents, haven't used it yet but looks in great shape and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a great chair! Gave to our daughter and son in law for their camping trips. They love it!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: really comfortable and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a 2nd chair to take with us camping, really comfortable and great quality. We love the size of this chair, and the lower sitting height is great for the campfire.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Madrigal

customer_reviews.title: Great for beach
customer_reviews.text: Awesome chair for the beach! The chair gets alot of looks and compliments, and it functions perfectly for us. Big enough to seat me, husband and our littlest kid (2 year old).
customer_reviews.author: Megnuge

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, easy to open and close and it fits ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this double chair to go car camping. It's lightweight, sturdy, easy to open and close and it fits two people and your dog. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J. Auferoth

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. Very roomy very comfortable. Perfect chair height for relaxing by a camp fire with a cold one.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight  Schrute

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! LOVE IT! LOVE IT! LOVE IT! LOVE IT! LOVE IT! ~ STURDY, COMFY AND GOOD LOOKING!
customer_reviews.author: ktisyy4u

customer_reviews.title: Great qualoty
customer_reviews.text: Great quality!! Lower than expected but husband still loved. Super comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect for soccer the new bag design is spot on
customer_reviews.author: Marsha  Blum

customer_reviews.title: We love our loveseat!
customer_reviews.text: Works great!! We even piled 3 of our small children on with us at an outdoor movie. It’s very comfy and cozy!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey B.

customer_reviews.title: The Kelty Low Loveseat is my new favorite Camp chair
customer_reviews.text: The Kelty Low Loveseat is my new favorite Camp chair. It’s sturdy, fits 2 adults comfortably plus a small to medium size dog. Great for couples, it is a little heavy but that’s due to its quality “A” rating. The carrying case is well made and can be used as a mat or even carry firewood. At 99$ this to me is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cuddling in front of a campfire
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat for camping. Fits two very comfortably. Cuddle up in front of the campfire. Bring a blanket for cold nights.
customer_reviews.author: Jack D. Menendez

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair, got it and was worried I would have a hard time getting out of it since it was the low version but haven't had a hard time at all! Great quality worth the amount it cost!
customer_reviews.author: Katie L.

customer_reviews.title: BEST CHAIR
customer_reviews.text: Best chair ever. Our friends used to fight over who got to sit in it, so we all bought our own.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get drunk in this chair. You will get stuck in it
customer_reviews.text: Super Comfortable. I bitch to get out of after too many cocktails around the fire.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great chair and perfect height for sitting in the back of the truck.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Really comfy and sturdy. I thought I ordered the regular height, but this one is fine too!
customer_reviews.author: ag

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it so much I regularly sit on it on my back porch.
customer_reviews.author: Steven W. Eckhoff

customer_reviews.title: Great Camping Chair
customer_reviews.text: As a family we loved this Loveseat Chair by Kelty; it was very easy for my kids to get in and out of, very stable. Always happy with our Kelty products!!! Great brand.
customer_reviews.author: Grommy Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for two
customer_reviews.text: Just love it! Take it to beach to enjoy sunsets with my honey!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Strong. But a little hard to get out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Strong. But a little hard to get out of because it is short.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Great touch chair
customer_reviews.text: Loved the chair, I took it to the frio river in Texas and it held strong all weekend. I weigh just under 200 and my girl is maybe 150. No trouble at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rmendoza317

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed at how sturdy this thing is. Two of us have been using this weekly at an outdoor music venue for months and took a couple of trips to the beach with it. The carrying strap works great.
customer_reviews.author: Karl J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A low cuddle chair for my husband and I. We call it our lazy boy for camping.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Good at the campfire and at outdoor concerts (doesn't block the view of those behind me)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable chair, a little heavy to carry around but the quality of the fabric is fantastic

product_meta.title: Kelty 61510716SM Low Loveseat Camp Chair - Smoke/Paradise Blue
product_meta.description: The Kelty low-love chair is a super-comfy folding chair made just for two. Perfect for all-day summer festivals or getting cozy around the campfire, the low-love chair folds up and fits into a deluxe carry sack for easy transport. The low-love chair has a slightly reclined design for increased comfort...the perfect chair to kick-back.
feature_bullets: Camping is all about relaxing & our furniture makes it easy to kick back around camp, relax with your squad wherever your adventures take you
The chair has a slightly reclined design for increased comfort, and its Roll-Tote carry bag can also be used as a tote for gear or firewood.
Features: durable steel frame, quilted 600D polyester, adjustable arm rest, insulated beverage holder, padded multi function roll tote storage
Dimensions: Size (W x D x H) 44 x 23.5 x 31.5 in, Packed (L x W x H) 34.5 x 11 x 11 in, Seat Height 13.5 in, Weight 15.4 lbs, Weight Capacity 400 lbs
